title: FPS Drop STILL
body:
GTX 1080 with I7700k processor and 16gb ram. 

Getting FPS drops down to 15-60 fps. Normally I run it at 144hz synced to my monitor. Even while it runs at 60 frames its extremely choppy and difficult to play.

I have done everything that the help page says to do. Nothing has helped. I'm fed up with it at this point, the game is almost unplayable.

replies.body:
It doesn't necessarily sound like frame-skipping to me (since I mentioned it though, [**these steps might be worth a try**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626)), so I wanna start with some of the basics to make sure we cover everything. Start off by making sure any third-party programs that might have overlays are turned off (*especially* Discord) and then make sure you've got the latest driver updates for that 1080 GTX. 

Let me know if you see any changes in a custom game after testing these steps. Even if it doesn't 100% fix things, it does help to narrow down what the real problem is so we can move forward!
I have applied those steps already and have still been getting frame drops and skipping frames. I have no overlays running and my drivers are up to date.

Thanks for the reply! With that being ruled out, I'm wondering if something is a little off within your specs or settings and I want to make sure nothing gets missed. It can be hard for us to troubleshoot from here, so if you don't mind shoot a ticket with this info over to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Also be sure to include your game logs so the techs can get a bigger picture of your system configurations and see what they can spot.

Hi.
Can you tell me what motherboard you have & what system you have installed- at this point I'll ask also about updates: are you patched your system with the latest patches?
After that can you tell me do you have any other games & do you have any issues with them?
And at the end (here) I'll ask about your safety: do you use any antivirus protection?

Hey!

I have the Asus STRIX Z270E GAMING ATX Mobo and my system and graphics card drivers are up to date. I run no antivirus since this is a dedicated gaming computer. I don't browse the web on it or download anything besides games from the distributors. I run PUBG completely fine at 100-144 fps on max settings, as well as Destiny 2 on max settings at 144 fps, same with Overwatch. League is the only game where I get frame drops and it started happening a few patches ago only.
